title: Flurry: A Mini Snowflakes Pop-Up Book
description:
The intricate beauty of snowflakes is revealed in this amazing little pop-up book. An enchanting explanation of the uniqueness of snowflakes, engages readers of all ages. Each of the seven spreads features illustrated pop-ups that are sure to surprise and delight.
  • Format: Hardcover
  • Dimensions: 4.75 x 1.25 x 6.5 in.
  • Pages: 7 spreads
  • Ages 3-6
